name: Sushi Roll (JamesSmaleDev, Sarah B, Hugo Bailey)
name_original: Sushi Roll (JamesSmaleDev, Sarah B, Hugo Bailey)
description:
Oh no, you're in the afterlife! But hey, at least the food is good?

Work alongside your trusty sous-chef (or...su-shif?) to serve top notch sushi to your customers. Compete for the most sushi served in the time given, and try not to make any mistakes!

Using just the number keys, this game requires speedy reactions and quick interpretation to reach the higher levels. 

Game developed as a submission for the Game Dev.TV game jam 2022 by our team:

Hugo Bailey - Programmer

James Smale - Programmer

Max Nuttall - 3D and VFX Artist

Sarah Briers - 3D and Character Artist
